CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial
JUDGES: Giovanni Bonello;Lech Garlicki;Ledi Bianku;Nebojša Vučinić;Nicolas Bratza;Päivi Hirvelä
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . By an administrative decision of CARDINAL DATE of the Head of GPE ( PERSON ) the real estate owned by the applicant ’s husband was transferred to his son – S.K. Neither the applicant ’s husband nor the applicant was informed by the authorities about this decision .
CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant ’s husband died in a car accident .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant filed a request with ORG ( PERSON ) for retrospective leave to appeal against the decision of CARDINAL DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE and CARDINAL DATE the applicant was informed by the Mayor of the Dominowo Commune ( PERSON ) that her request had been left without consideration .

CARDINAL . On DATE she complained to the Head of ORG ( PERSON ) about the fact that her case had been left without consideration and that no decision had been taken on it . She did not receive any answer .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant repeated her request for retrospective leave to appeal against the decision of CARDINAL DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( PERSON ) informed the applicant that her request could not be dealt with since the case file had been sent to ORG ( PERSON ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant complained to ORG about the delay . She asked for the proceedings to be accelerated .
CARDINAL . On DATE she lodged a complaint about the inactivity of the Mayor of the Commune with ORG ( ORG PERSON ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG rejected the applicant ’s complaint , since the applicant had failed to lodge it in accordance with the formal requirements set out in NORP law , namely she had failed to lodge a complaint with the administrative authority under LAW .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged a complaint about the inactivity of the Mayor of the Dominowo Commune with ORG ( PERSON ) . The complaint was referred to ORG , being the competent administrative authority .
CARDINAL . By a resolution of CARDINAL DATE her complaint was dismissed as ill - founded .

CARDINAL . On DATE she lodged a complaint about the inactivity of the Mayor of the Dominowo Commune with ORG . She submitted that she had lodged numerous complaints with different administrative authorities , her case had been pending for DATE and no decision had been given on it .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG found the complaint well - founded . It held that the proceedings in the applicant ’s case had exceeded a reasonable time and ordered the Mayor of GPE to proceed speedily with the case .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of Appeal decided to grant the applicant retrospective leave to appeal against the decision of DATE .
